record.description: Electron micrograph of frog retinal rod unit disk with superimposed ultra-miniaturized integrated circuit mask and text, demagnified 10 to the 4th power electron-optically on organometallic thin film substrate. Prepared in collaboration with C. Hough. The white spheres are latex particles of known diameter (2,800 angstroms, or a little more than a hundred-thousandth of an inch), added for calibration.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See May 1967 cover and issue U of C magazine. Photos courtesy of H. Fernandez-Moran for his monograph on experiments using electron microscopy. Mounted on board.
